JOB DESCRIPTION: Roles and Responsibilities 4+ Years of experience into the industry.Full stack Developer and hands on into Core JAVA, Springboot, Spring Batch, Hibernate, Design Pattern, JQuery, REST API, Spring Security and Angular2.Diversified experience of working in enterprise and e-Gov domain (preferred).Perform and analyze the security vulnerability on all deployed applications and lifecycle of all applications.Experienced in developing queries using SQL/PL-SQL and creating Database, Tables, Views, Procedures, Cursor and Trigger.Worked on performance optimization and testing of existing applications built using latest technologies in Java stack.Code reviews and functional testing of web applications.Analysis, Design and Development in diversified areas of Client-Server, Distributed and Web applications using Java, J2EE technologies.
